WorkItem.Description:
I have installed the binaries, then tried to install the visx but I receive an error.

These are the last lines of the log:

Found installed product - Microsoft Visual Studio Express 2012 for Windows 8
26/11/2012 23.22.11 - Found installed product - Global Location
26/11/2012 23.22.11 - VSIXInstaller.NoApplicableSKUsException: This extension is not installable on any currently installed products.

Comments.Message: Please use VS13 community edition instead of the deprecated Express edition.
